column4: I have an issue. I was messing with the setting for compiz and I disabled opengl which caused unity to crash, and even when i re-enabled everything and restarted ubuntu, unity is still broken. Anybody know why unity wont start? Compiz returns with "Couldn't open display"

I have an issue. I was messing with the setting for compiz and I disabled opengl which caused unity to crash, and even when i re-enabled everything and restarted ubuntu, unity is still broken. Anybody know why unity wont start? Compiz returns with "Couldn't open display"
Lol, i've never used dpkg to be honest o.O
